HDG.BC.content: more difficult to say how “being” belongs to subject than object? > flight from object to subject a questionable way out of question of “being”
HDG.BC.linkedContent: more difficult to say how “being” belongs to subject than object? > flight from object to subject a questionable way out of question of “being”

HDG.BC.content: in modernity, never before achieved “objectivity” supposed to be reached because man has become a subject > in modernity, Being anthropomorphized, we don’t come into relation w/ Being itself, only what humans represent it as [can we ever come into relation to it???], “humanize” Being
HDG.BC.linkedContent: in modernity, never before achieved “objectivity” supposed to be reached because man has become a subject > in modernity, Being anthropomorphized, we don’t come into relation w/ Being itself, only what humans represent it as [can we ever come into relation to it???], “humanize” Being

HDG.BT.content: [Heidegger lists spirit among other problematic historical domains of Being: ego cogito, subject, reason, person]
HDG.BT.linkedContent: [Heidegger lists spirit among other problematic historical domains of Being: ego cogito, subject, reason, person]

HDG.QB.content: [immense degree of waiting] perhaps moment will come [not yet] when essence of nihilism will show itself more clearly in other ways, in brighter light, until then setting out on a path that leads to a discussion of essence of Being, on this path alone can question concerning the nothing be discussed (must relinquish language of metaphysics [does that include Being?], but [still?] subject to other demands than changing an old terminology for a new one [paleonym] > endeavor to undertake transformation will presumably remain tentative for a long time [not yet there, telos], that’s not an adequate reason for failing to undertake it
HDG.QB.linkedContent: [immense degree of waiting] perhaps moment will come [not yet] when essence of nihilism will show itself more clearly in other ways, in brighter light, until then setting out on a path that leads to a discussion of essence of Being, on this path alone can question concerning the nothing be discussed (must relinquish language of metaphysics [does that include Being?], but [still?] subject to other demands than changing an old terminology for a new one [paleonym] > endeavor to undertake transformation will presumably remain tentative for a long time [not yet there, telos], that’s not an adequate reason for failing to undertake it

HDG.QB.content: “attempt to cross the line” captivated in form of representation (in ein Vorstellen gebannt) belonging to dominion (Herrschaftsbereich) of oblivion of Being > subject to doubts, like every image > but these doubts (Zweifeln) can’t touch illuminative force of images, their originary/uncircumventable presence (ursprüngliche und unumgehbare Gegenwart)—shows how little experience we have in the saying of thinking (der Sage des Denkens), in essence of such saying
HDG.QB.linkedContent: “attempt to cross the line” captivated in form of representation (in ein Vorstellen gebannt) belonging to dominion (Herrschaftsbereich) of oblivion of Being > subject to doubts, like every image > but these doubts (Zweifeln) can’t touch illuminative force of images, their originary/uncircumventable presence (ursprüngliche und unumgehbare Gegenwart)—shows how little experience we have in the saying of thinking (der Sage des Denkens), in essence of such saying

HDG.FS.content: driving force of subject-object dichotomy: quest for absolute certainty (Gewissheit), interpreting truth as certainty > Descartes’ ego cogito, as upokeimenon, subjectum, fundamentum inconcussum, henceforth, nature only appears as Object for a Subject > prelude to this advent: Luther’s quest for certainty in faith, Galileo’s search for mathematical certainty of nature, all prepared by nominalist separation of words/things, Ockham’s formalism makes possible project (Entwurf) of mathematical key (Schlüssels) to world > grasp in one concept: unity of mathematical certainty & certainty of salvation
HDG.FS.linkedContent: driving force of subject-object dichotomy: quest for absolute certainty (Gewissheit), interpreting truth as certainty > Descartes’ ego cogito, as upokeimenon, subjectum, fundamentum inconcussum, henceforth, nature only appears as Object for a Subject > prelude to this advent: Luther’s quest for certainty in faith, Galileo’s search for mathematical certainty of nature, all prepared by nominalist separation of words/things, Ockham’s formalism makes possible project (Entwurf) of mathematical key (Schlüssels) to world > grasp in one concept: unity of mathematical certainty & certainty of salvation

HDG.FS.content: when Heidegger first attempts to exit prison of consciousness (in Being and Time), not restoring realism against idealism: realism (assurance a world exists for subject) dependent on Cartesianism [Heidegger attempting to think Greek sense of egō]
HDG.FS.linkedContent: when Heidegger first attempts to exit prison of consciousness (in Being and Time), not restoring realism against idealism: realism (assurance a world exists for subject) dependent on Cartesianism [Heidegger attempting to think Greek sense of egō]

HDG.FS.content: Hegel uses word science (Wissenschaft) in Fichte’s sense, “System of Science,” system of philosophy, “Science”: philosophy become absolute knowledge (of subject)
HDG.FS.linkedContent: Hegel uses word science (Wissenschaft) in Fichte’s sense, “System of Science,” system of philosophy, “Science”: philosophy become absolute knowledge (of subject)

HDG.FS.content: reach speculative when predicate of sentence (being) is made into subject: God is being itself becomes being is God: the meaning of “is” has changed: not a mere reversal, a counter-blow (Gegenstoss) [spirit of revenge in dialectic?], counter-movement (Gegenbewegung) of 2nd “is” upon 1st “is”: Eckhart said Istic-heit, Being is God understood speculatively: Being lets God be God, “is” speaks in transitive/active
HDG.FS.linkedContent: reach speculative when predicate of sentence (being) is made into subject: God is being itself becomes being is God: the meaning of “is” has changed: not a mere reversal, a counter-blow (Gegenstoss) [spirit of revenge in dialectic?], counter-movement (Gegenbewegung) of 2nd “is” upon 1st “is”: Eckhart said Istic-heit, Being is God understood speculatively: Being lets God be God, “is” speaks in transitive/active

HDG.DL.content: [in metaphysical aesthetics] art work an object for our feelings/ideas, artist the subject related to his work as object: a treacherous framework (verfänglich), can capture (einfangen) all other kinds of experience of art & its nature > Iki is the gracious (Anmutende)
HDG.DL.linkedContent: [in metaphysical aesthetics] art work an object for our feelings/ideas, artist the subject related to his work as object: a treacherous framework (verfänglich), can capture (einfangen) all other kinds of experience of art & its nature > Iki is the gracious (Anmutende)

HDG.WL.content: what is speaking (Sprechen), the expression of thought, if we think of its origin as the inner activity of spirit (inneren Geistestätigkeit)? > acc. modern thought, labor of spirit (Arbeit des Geistes) is a setting/positing (Setzen) (thesis), spirit conceived as subject, represented w/in subject-object model (Schema), so positing must be synthesis btwn subject/object
HDG.WL.linkedContent: what is speaking (Sprechen), the expression of thought, if we think of its origin as the inner activity of spirit (inneren Geistestätigkeit)? > acc. modern thought, labor of spirit (Arbeit des Geistes) is a setting/positing (Setzen) (thesis), spirit conceived as subject, represented w/in subject-object model (Schema), so positing must be synthesis btwn subject/object

HDG.WL.content: Humboldt regards language as a world and world view (Weltansicht) > he doesn’t think language as language, but language as chief source of historical-spiritual development of man > language as a world view of a human subjectivity > Humboldt reads language as energeia, but thinks energeia in wholly un-Greek manner, via Leibniz’s monadology as activity of subject: language is turned in direction of man > Humboldt doesn’t consider the Sprachwesen (linguistic nature) of the nature of language (Wesen der Sprache): the being of language, that it abides (währt), remains gathered in what it grants itself
HDG.WL.linkedContent: Humboldt regards language as a world and world view (Weltansicht) > he doesn’t think language as language, but language as chief source of historical-spiritual development of man > language as a world view of a human subjectivity > Humboldt reads language as energeia, but thinks energeia in wholly un-Greek manner, via Leibniz’s monadology as activity of subject: language is turned in direction of man > Humboldt doesn’t consider the Sprachwesen (linguistic nature) of the nature of language (Wesen der Sprache): the being of language, that it abides (währt), remains gathered in what it grants itself

HDG.EC.content: waiting as authentic thinking? entering still-withheld essence of our [why our?] vanquished people > by becoming those who wait, we 1st become German? [become German, but not like Nazis… (cf. 154)] if we plan to find “the German” we simply chase after the national: nation as representation, so people become a subject, so that everything appears objective
HDG.EC.linkedContent: waiting as authentic thinking? entering still-withheld essence of our [why our?] vanquished people > by becoming those who wait, we 1st become German? [become German, but not like Nazis… (cf. 154)] if we plan to find “the German” we simply chase after the national: nation as representation, so people become a subject, so that everything appears objective

HDG.OHF.content: questions grow out of confrontation (Auseinandersetzung) w/ “subject matter (Sachen)” > subject matter there (da) only where eyes are
HDG.OHF.linkedContent: questions grow out of confrontation (Auseinandersetzung) w/ “subject matter (Sachen)” > subject matter there (da) only where eyes are

HDG.OHF.content: two modes of Dasein of today (Dasein im Heute) (discourse about Dasein) [initial givens of today, closest to us? (Zunächst des Heute)] (: 1) historical consciousness 2) philosophy > modes of interpreting, modes of Dasein’s having-itself in a definite manner, must interrogate these modes to interrogate Dasein of today, to subject the today to a destruction > genuine question of hermeneutics: what Seinscharakter of Dasein shows up (zeigt sich) [cf. Sage as showing] in these modes of having-itself (Sichselbstshabens)?
HDG.OHF.linkedContent: two modes of Dasein of today (Dasein im Heute) (discourse about Dasein) [initial givens of today, closest to us? (Zunächst des Heute)] (: 1) historical consciousness 2) philosophy > modes of interpreting, modes of Dasein’s having-itself in a definite manner, must interrogate these modes to interrogate Dasein of today, to subject the today to a destruction > genuine question of hermeneutics: what Seinscharakter of Dasein shows up (zeigt sich) [cf. Sage as showing] in these modes of having-itself (Sichselbstshabens)?

HDG.OHF.content: object of the past (Vergangenheit), in historical consciousness, stands in fundamental definition (Grundbestimmung): Ausdrucksein eines etwas von etwas > the past’s being subjected to a known definition, temporally particular styles > Vor-sicht (fore-sight) [not forehaving?] having the style in view
HDG.OHF.linkedContent: object of the past (Vergangenheit), in historical consciousness, stands in fundamental definition (Grundbestimmung): Ausdrucksein eines etwas von etwas > the past’s being subjected to a known definition, temporally particular styles > Vor-sicht (fore-sight) [not forehaving?] having the style in view

HDG.OHF.content: expressive network of reference to different cultural systems demands possibility of holding onto them in a unified manner (einer einheitlichen Behaltbarkeit) > thus, investigations are actualizing (vollzieht) themselves out of a foresight re: and of a having-in-view of styles (Vorsicht auf- und einem Im-Blick-haben des Stils) > w/in this point of view (Hinblick) the modes of expressive being are actualized > the anticipatory having-present of the cultural object, running in advance of all research, made explicit in its actualization: das Vorweghaben der Stileinheitlichkeit (the anticipatory forehaving or path-having in advance of unity of style) proves/guards (bewährt) its adequacy to subject matter while explaining itself (its basic characteristics still hidden) [self-fulfilling w/out an eye to destruction]
HDG.OHF.linkedContent: expressive network of reference to different cultural systems demands possibility of holding onto them in a unified manner (einer einheitlichen Behaltbarkeit) > thus, investigations are actualizing (vollzieht) themselves out of a foresight re: and of a having-in-view of styles (Vorsicht auf- und einem Im-Blick-haben des Stils) > w/in this point of view (Hinblick) the modes of expressive being are actualized > the anticipatory having-present of the cultural object, running in advance of all research, made explicit in its actualization: das Vorweghaben der Stileinheitlichkeit (the anticipatory forehaving or path-having in advance of unity of style) proves/guards (bewährt) its adequacy to subject matter while explaining itself (its basic characteristics still hidden) [self-fulfilling w/out an eye to destruction]

HDG.OHF.content: “tarrying among (Verweilen bei)” sustains possibility of actualizing a universal classifying that compares [historical] forms, in it lies relational guarantee that every past culture can be encountered objectively > a constant seeing this & that, can never halt [cf. 45 abode-less tarrying (das aufenthaltslose Verweilen) that holds itself/sojourns in (Aufhalten) what it returns to) > what’s encountered in this Verweilen as universal possibility of expression, divided into unities of style: beings in the How of their having-being, already there [for us to see] (i.e. past is available, is a past present, not our virtuality) > a pull (Zug) arises from the already there (schon da) in the past: world, life, publicness, what was going on [if destruction occurs by thinking Zug outside of Zug of historical consciousness, deconstruction occurs by noting that Zug of historical consciousness never occurs, i.e that everyday facticity has been overdetermined, we were never that close to it]
HDG.OHF.linkedContent: “tarrying among (Verweilen bei)” sustains possibility of actualizing a universal classifying that compares [historical] forms, in it lies relational guarantee that every past culture can be encountered objectively > a constant seeing this & that, can never halt [cf. 45 abode-less tarrying (das aufenthaltslose Verweilen) that holds itself/sojourns in (Aufhalten) what it returns to) > what’s encountered in this Verweilen as universal possibility of expression, divided into unities of style: beings in the How of their having-being, already there [for us to see] (i.e. past is available, is a past present, not our virtuality) > a pull (Zug) arises from the already there (schon da) in the past: world, life, publicness, what was going on [if destruction occurs by thinking Zug outside of Zug of historical consciousness, deconstruction occurs by noting that Zug of historical consciousness never occurs, i.e that everyday facticity has been overdetermined, we were never that close to it]

HDG.OHF.content: [why phenomenology requires destruction] in any discipline, we’re face to face w/ how things stand at the moment [i.e. how the public world views them] > their showing-themselves (Sich-zeigen) can be so restricted/fixed (festgelegt) by tradition, the inauthenticity goes unnoticed, taken for authentic: one passes off a contingency (Zufälligkeit) as an in-itself, takes a covering up (Verdeckung) for Sache itself > need to get beyond position started from (Anfangsstellung) & arrive at grasp of subject matter free of covering up (zur verdeckungsfreien Sacherfassung zu kommen) > the tradition must be dismantled (abgebaut)
HDG.OHF.linkedContent: [why phenomenology requires destruction] in any discipline, we’re face to face w/ how things stand at the moment [i.e. how the public world views them] > their showing-themselves (Sich-zeigen) can be so restricted/fixed (festgelegt) by tradition, the inauthenticity goes unnoticed, taken for authentic: one passes off a contingency (Zufälligkeit) as an in-itself, takes a covering up (Verdeckung) for Sache itself > need to get beyond position started from (Anfangsstellung) & arrive at grasp of subject matter free of covering up (zur verdeckungsfreien Sacherfassung zu kommen) > the tradition must be dismantled (abgebaut)

HDG.OHF.content: significance not a characteristic of things but of being > theories re: actuality (Wirklichkeit) and reality need to be subjected (unterwerfen) to critical phenomenological destruction: such a critique only actualized (vollziehen) from out of positive insight (Sicht) [already attend to Being?]
HDG.OHF.linkedContent: significance not a characteristic of things but of being > theories re: actuality (Wirklichkeit) and reality need to be subjected (unterwerfen) to critical phenomenological destruction: such a critique only actualized (vollziehen) from out of positive insight (Sicht) [already attend to Being?]

HDG.OHF.content: not “names,” but what’s decisive re: subject matter (das sachlich Entscheidende)
HDG.OHF.linkedContent: not “names,” but what’s decisive re: subject matter (das sachlich Entscheidende)
